blocks.name: dirkerval
blocks.content: The N_th Dirichlet Kernel. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm dirkerval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s1, cn, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(cv(s1), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cn, c1, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  mpteq2dva(s0, cr, cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)), cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  ifeq12d(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))
  oveq1d(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi), co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), caddc, nat1), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  oveq1d(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1, co(nat2, cmul, c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  oveq2d(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  oveq1d(cfv(csin, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2))), cfv(csin, co(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  fvoveq1d(csin, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0), co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  oveq1d(cv(hs0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  eqtri(c1, cmpt(hs0, cn, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)))), cmpt(s1, cn, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(cv(s1), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)))))
  cbvmptv(s1, hs0, cn, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(cv(s1), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  mpteq2dva(s0, cr, cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(cv(s1), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)), cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  ifeq12d(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(cv(s1), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))
  oveq1d(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  oveq1d(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1, co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  oveq2d(nat2, cmul, cv(s1), cv(hs0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  oveq1d(cfv(csin, co(co(cv(s1), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2))), cfv(csin, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  fvoveq1d(csin, co(cv(s1), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  oveq1d(cv(s1), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cv(hs0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  mptex(s0, cr, cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)))
  reex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, cr, cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cn.s(s1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, cr, cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)))
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.cif.s(s1, co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))
  diff.co.s(s1, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
  diff.co.s(s1, co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat2, cmul, cv(hs0))
  diff.co.s(s1, cfv(csin, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2))))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, csin, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0)))
  diff.co.s(s1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(hs0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat1, cdiv, nat2)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2))
  diff.csin.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)
  diff.cdiv.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, co(cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cmo.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat2, cmul, cpi)
  diff.nat2.s(s1)
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
  diff.cpi.s(s1)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, cr, cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(cv(s1), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s0))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

blocks.name: dirker2re
blocks.content: The Dirchlet Kernel value is a real if the argument is not a multiple of π . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm dirker2re(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))), wcel(co(cfv(csin, co(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, c1)), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(c1, cdiv, nat2)))), cr))
} = {
  redivcld(cfv(csin, co(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, c1)), co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(c1, cdiv, nat2))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  resincld(co(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  remulcld(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  readdcld(c0, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)), wcel(c0, cr))
  nnre(c0)
  rehalfcld(nat1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  1red(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  remulcld(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cfv(csin, co(c1, cdiv, nat2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  remulcld(nat2, cpi, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))), wcel(nat2, cr))
  2re()
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))), wcel(cpi, cr))
  pire()
  resincld(co(c1, cdiv, nat2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  rehalfcld(c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)))
  adantll(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)), wne(co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(c1, cdiv, nat2))), nat0))
  mulne0d(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cfv(csin, co(c1, cdiv, nat2)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  mulcld(nat2, cpi, wa(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  sincld(co(c1, cdiv, nat2), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  mulne0d(nat2, cpi, wa(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  neqned(cfv(csin, co(c1, cdiv, nat2)), nat0, wa(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  mtbird(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))), wceq(cfv(csin, co(c1, cdiv, nat2)), nat0), wcel(co(co(c1, cdiv, nat2), cdiv, cpi), cz))
  eqneltrd(co(co(c1, cdiv, nat2), cdiv, cpi), cz, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  divdiv1d(c1, nat2, cpi, wa(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  2cnd(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))), wcel(cpi, cc))
  picn()
  a1i(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
  a1i(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))), wne(cpi, nat0))
  gtneii(cpi, nat0)
  0re()
  pipos()
  mtbid(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cz), wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))
  simpr(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)))
  adantr(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)), wb(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cz)))
  mpan2(wcel(c1, cr), wb(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cz)), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), crp))
  mp2an(wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), crp), wcel(nat2, crp), wcel(cpi, crp))
  2rp()
  pirp()
  rpmulcl(nat2, cpi)
  mod0(c1, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
  syl(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))), wb(wceq(cfv(csin, co(c1, cdiv, nat2)), nat0), wcel(co(co(c1, cdiv, nat2), cdiv, cpi), cz)), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, nat2), cc))
  halfcld(c1, wa(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  adantr(wcel(c1, cr), wn(wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  recn(c1)
  sineq0(co(c1, cdiv, nat2))
}

blocks.content: The Dirchlet Kernel denominator is never ` 0 ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm dirkerdenne0(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))), wne(co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))), nat0))
} = {

  mulcld(nat2, cpi, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  sincld(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  mulne0d(nat2, cpi, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  neqned(cfv(csin, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), nat0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  mtbird(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))), wceq(cfv(csin, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), nat0), wcel(co(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cdiv, cpi), cz))
  eqneltrd(co(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cdiv, cpi), cz, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  divdiv1d(c0, nat2, cpi, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  2cnd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))), wcel(cpi, cc))
  picn()
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))), wne(cpi, nat0))
  gtneii(cpi, nat0)
  0re()
  pipos()
  mtbid(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cz), wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cz)))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cz)), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), crp))
  mp2an(wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), crp), wcel(nat2, crp), wcel(cpi, crp))
  2rp()
  pirp()
  rpmulcl(nat2, cpi)
  mod0(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))), wb(wceq(cfv(csin, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), nat0), wcel(co(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cdiv, cpi), cz)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cc))
  halfcld(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wn(wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))))

blocks.name: dirkerre
blocks.content: The Dirichlet Kernel at any point evaluates to a real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm dirkerre(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cfv(cfv(c2, c0), c1), cr))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cn, cmpt(s1, cr, cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s1))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s1), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s1), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqeltrd(cfv(cfv(c2, c0), c1), cr, cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, c1)), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(c1, cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr)))
  dirkerval2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  ifclda(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, c1)), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(c1, cdiv, nat2)))), cr, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(c1, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0), wcel(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cr))
  redivcld(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), caddc, nat1), co(nat2, cmul, cpi), wcel(c0, cn))
  readdcld(co(nat2, cmul, c0), nat1, wcel(c0, cn))
  remulcld(nat2, c0, wcel(c0, cn))
  nnre(c0)
  1red(wcel(c0, cn))
  remulcld(nat2, cpi, wcel(c0, cn))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(nat2, cr))
  2re()
  mulne0d(nat2, cpi, wcel(c0, cn))
  2cnd(wcel(c0, cn))
  recnd(cpi, wcel(c0, cn))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cpi, cr))
  pire()
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wne(cpi, nat0))
  gtneii(cpi, nat0)
  0re()
  pipos()
  dirker2re(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: dirkerper
blocks.content: the Dirichlet Kernel has period ` 2 _pi ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: dirkerf
blocks.content: For any natural number ` N ` , the Dirichlet Kernel ` ( D `` N ) ` is a function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

thm dirkerf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wf(cfv(c1, c0), cr, cr))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cn, cmpt(s1, cr, cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s1))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s1), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s1), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cn), wf(cfv(c1, c0), cr, cr), wf(cmpt(s1, cr, cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s1))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s1), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s1), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))), cr, cr))
  fmpttd(s1, cr, cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s1))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s1), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s1), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)), cr, wcel(c0, cn))
  eqeltrrd(cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s1))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s1), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s1), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0)), cr, cfv(cfv(c1, c0), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s1), cr)))
  dirkerval2(s0, s1, c0, cv(s1), c1)
  dirkerre(s0, s1, c0, cv(s1), c1)
  feq1d(cfv(c1, c0), cr, cr, cmpt(s1, cr, cif(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(cfv(csin, co(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, cv(s1))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(cv(s1), cdiv, nat2)))), wceq(co(cv(s1), cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))), wcel(c0, cn))
  dirkerval(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cn)
  diff.cn.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)

blocks.name: dirkertrigeqlem3
blocks.content: Trigonometric equality lemma for the Dirichlet Kernel trigonometric equality. Here we handle the case for an angle that's an odd multiple of ` _pi ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:

  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), caddc, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), cfv(ccos, co(cv(s0), cmul, c1)))), cdiv, cpi), co(cfv(csin, co(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, c1)), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(c1, cdiv, nat2))))))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wceq(c1, co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c2), caddc, nat1), cmul, cpi))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, wceq(co(co(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), caddc, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), cfv(ccos, co(cv(s0), cmul, c1)))), cdiv, cpi), co(cfv(csin, co(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cmul, c1)), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cmul, cfv(csin, co(c1, cdiv, nat2))))), wceq(co(c0, cmo, nat2), nat0))

  3eqtrd(co(co(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), caddc, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), cfv(ccos, co(cv(s0), cmul, c1)))), cdiv, cpi), co(nat1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(co(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), caddc, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), cfv(ccos, co(cpi, cmul, cv(s0))))), cdiv, cpi), co(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cdiv, cpi), wa(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmo, nat2), nat0)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmo, nat2), nat0), wceq(co(co(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), caddc, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), cfv(ccos, co(cv(s0), cmul, c1)))), cdiv, cpi), co(co(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), caddc, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), cfv(ccos, co(cpi, cmul, cv(s0))))), cdiv, cpi)))
  oveq1d(co(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), caddc, csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), cfv(ccos, co(cpi, cmul, cv(s0))))), cdiv, cpi, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), wa(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmo, nat2), nat0)))

blocks.name: dirkertrigeq
blocks.content: Trigonometric equality for the Dirichlet kernel. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: dirkercncflem1
blocks.content: If ` Y ` is a multiple of ` _pi ` then it belongs to an open inerval ` ( A (,) B ) ` such that for any other point ` y ` in the interval, cos y/2 and sin y/2 are nonzero. Such an interval is needed to apply De L'Hopital theorem. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm dirkercncflem1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wral(s0, cdif(co(c1, cioo, c2), csn(c0)), wa(wne(cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)), nat0), wne(cfv(ccos, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)), nat0)))))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c0, cmin, cpi))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c0, caddc, cpi))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmo, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wral(s0, cdif(co(c1, cioo, c2), csn(c0)), wa(wne(cfv(csin, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)), nat0), wne(cfv(ccos, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)), nat0))))), diffsc(s0, c0))

blocks.name: dirkercncflem2
blocks.content: Lemma used to prove that the Dirichlet Kernel is continuous at ` Y ` points that are multiples of ` ( 2 x. _pi ) ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: dirkercncflem3
blocks.content: The Dirichlet Kernel is continuous at ` Y ` points that are multiples of ` ( 2 x. _pi ) ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: dirkercncflem4
blocks.content: The Dirichlet Kernel is continuos at points that are not multiple of 2 π . This is the easier condition, for the proof of the continuity of the Dirichlet kernel. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: dirkercncf
blocks.content: For any natural number ` N ` , the Dirichlet Kernel ` ( D `` N ) ` is continuous. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
